p: It is important to note that the majority of the inventoried plant species are native to the Mediterranean region or North Africa. Interestingly, Bunium incrassatum (Boiss.) Batt. & Trab. and Origanum floribundum Munby have been reported as Algerian endemic plant species. The use of other introduced species like Saussurea costus (Falc.) Lipsch was also reported.
